title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A practical guide on how small changes in habits can lead to remarkable results. James Clear shows how tiny, consistent improvements shape identity and drive long-term success.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: Michelle Obama's memoir chronicles her journey from childhood on the South Side of Chicago to her years as an executive and her time as First Lady of the United States.

title: Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A brief history of humankind exploring how Homo sapiens came to dominate the world and the impact of cognitive, agricultural, and scientific revolutions.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A romantic novel following the character development of Elizabeth Bennet who learns about the repercussions of hasty judgments and comes to appreciate the difference between superficial goodness and actual goodness.

title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: Set in the Jazz Age on Long Island, the novel depicts narrator Nick Carraway's interactions with mysterious millionaire Jay Gatsby and Gatsby's obsession to reunite with his former lover, Daisy Buchanan.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit enjoying his quiet life, is swept into an epic quest to reclaim the lost Dwarf Kingdom of Erebor from the fearsome dragon Smaug.

title: The Hunger Games
author: Suzanne Collins
description: In a dystopian future, Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, a televised competition where teenagers fight to the death.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne reports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing. Under pressure from the police and the media, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble.

title: Harry Potter
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry Potter, an orphaned boy, discovers on his eleventh birthday that he is a wizard and begins his magical education at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
